scripts.diff:all: sh -c 'mkdir -p patches && for gadgetFile in *.gadget.js; do baseName=$(basename "$gadgetFile" .gadget.js); userFile="$baseName.user.js"; [ -f "$userFile" ] && pnpm run diff "$baseName"; done' _
scripts.patch:all: sh -c 'for patchFile in patches/*.gadget.patch; do baseName=$(basename "$patchFile" .gadget.patch); pnpm run patch "$baseName"; done' _
scripts.publish:all: npm run publish:gadget && npm run publish:gf
